generated_text:
{
  "title": "Chicken Alfredo",
  "serving_size": 4,
  "ingredients": {
    "Pasta": "Angel Hair Pasta",
    "Chicken": "Chicken Breast",
    "Dairy": ["Butter", "Heavy Cream", "Parmesan Cheese"],
    "Seasoning": ["Salt", "Pepper", "Garlic Powder"],
    "Olive Oil": "Olive Oil"
  },
  "instructions": [
    "Cook angel hair pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.",
    "Season chicken breast with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Cook chicken until browned and no longer pink in the center. Remove from skillet and slice into strips.",
    "In the same skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Stir in heavy cream and Parmesan cheese until the sauce is smooth and creamy.",
    "Add cooked pasta and chicken strips to the sauce, tossing to coat evenly. Cook for a few minutes until everything is heated through.",
    "Serve hot and garnish with additional Parmesan cheese if desired."
  ]
}
